SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Attack
ConcreteState of the State pattern.Attack phase defines behavior for advance, attack and card commands that are valid in this state, and for the others signifies that the command is invalid.
ColorCoding
The class ColorCoding manages the colors.
Connectivity
The class Connectivity manages the transfer of data from skeleton to other classes where the map objects are used.
Continent
The class Continent defines Continents and it's properties such as ID, Name, Bonus Value and list of countries it has.
Country
The class Country defines Countries and it's properties such as ID, Name, Continent ID, list of neighbors and number of armies deployed on the country.
CountryTest
 
Edit
The abstract sub class Edit contains states for Preload and Postload states.
End
The End class represents the end phase of the game.
Fortify
The Fortify class represents the phase where players can choose to fortify their countries.
GameDriver
The main driver class for starting the game engine.
GameEngine
Context of the State pattern.
Graph
Graph class is used to recreate .map file in the graph format
JunitTestModels
 
JunitTestState
 
JunitTestTools
 
LogEntryBuffer
This class refers to the log entry into the file.
LogWriter
 
MainPlay
ConcreteState of the State pattern.
Map
The class Map defines Maps and it's properties such as File Name and checker if the file exists or not.
MapCheck
The class MapCheck performs validation of map.
MapCreater
The class MapCreator will write in the file whenever user creates a map.
MapEditor
The class MapEditor will make changes to the existing map according to the user.
MapEditorTest
The class MapEditor tests if we can add continent,if we can add country with or without continent, if we can add neighbour without country or continent.
MapLoader
The class MapLoader will load the map selected by the user.
MapLoaderTest
The class MapLoader tests if we can load the valid map or not.
Observable
This is an Observable interface.
Observer
This is an Observer interface.
Order
The class Order defines Orders and it's properties such as from country, to country and transfer of number of armies and the Content of the order in the form of String.
Phase
The abstract class Phase manages the states in the State pattern.
phaseValidation
The class PhaseValidation tests if right phase is being executed at right time.
Play
ConcreteState of the State pattern.
Player
The class Player defines Players and it's properties such as Name, player ID,Order list of the player,countries owned by the player army count of the player, continents owned by the player, cards owned by the player , a diplomacy variable to be used by the diplomacy card and a static variable to keep track of the object of players.
PlayersGameplay
The class PlayerGameplay manages the player perspective.
PlayersGameplayTest
The class PlayerGameplay tests all the player perspective.
PlaySetup
Concrete state representing the setup phase of the game.
PostLoad
Concrete state representing the phase after loading a map.
Preload
Concrete state representing the phase before loading a map.
Reinforcement
Concrete state representing the Reinforcement phase of the game.
SaveMap
The class SaveMap saves the map once user creates a new map or make changes to the existing ones.
TestSuit
 
validateGraph
This class is used for validating the graph representation of map
ViewMap
The class ViewMap displays the map in an tabular manner.
